alert.note: Alert for Gallatin; Madison (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 28 at 3:12PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Broadwater, northeastern Madison, southeastern Jefferson and northern Gallatin Counties through 400 PM MDT... At 311 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 11 miles east of Whitehall to 6 miles east of Harrison to 15 miles northeast of Ennis. Movement was east northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Bozeman, Belgrade, Three Forks, Manhattan, Toston, Bozeman Hot Springs, Gallatin Gateway, Missouri Headwaters State Park, Logan, Four Corners, Amsterdam, Trident, Church Hill, Willow Creek, Menard and Madison Buffalo Jump State Park. This includes the following highways... Interstate 90 between mile markers 260 and 321. Highway 12 between mile markers 87 and 109. Highway 287 between mile markers 80 and 97. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
